Package com.datastax.stargate.sdk

Class StargateHttpClient

java.lang.Object
com.datastax.stargate.sdk.StargateHttpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApiConstants
public class StargateHttpClient extends Object implements ApiConstants
Wrapper for calls handling: retries, load-balancing and failover. Delegating all HTTP invocation to keep the main class also empty and exposing only public methods.
Author:
Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)

  • Field Summary
